vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_rdmdipntr(unsigned short FlibHndl, ODBMDIP *mdip);

cmn.p:
Reads the execution pointer information for MDI operating program.
The content which can be acquired is the following items.
cmn.ul:
program number being executed It is basically 0 for MDI operation.(In case of Series 16i/18i-W, it is -1.)
When executing program is sub-program, the sub-program number is returned.
execution block pointer Block pointer which is being currently executed in CNC.
preread program number Program number read in advance.(displayed in green on the CNC screen)
For MDI operating, it is basically 0, and for reading sub-program in advance, it is the number of sub-program.
preread block pointer Last block pointer in the program read ahead.
cmn.p:
In Series 15/15i, it is invalid except 'preread block pointer'. (0 can be read at any time)
In Series 16i/18i-W, 'preread program number' and 'preread block pointer' are invalid.
In Series 30i, 0i-D and PMi-A 'program number being executed' and 'execution block pointer' are invalid.

In Series 16/18, 16i/18i, 30i, Power Mate i, it is possible to use this function for the program number 8 digits, however it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits.
See Program number 8 digits for details.

is.p:
Reads the execution pointer information for MDI operating program.
The content which can be acquired is the following items.
is.ul:
preread program number Program number read in advance.(displayed in green on the CNC screen) For MDI operating, it is 0.
preread block pointer Last block pointer in the program read ahead.
is.p: It is possible to use this function for the program number 8 digits, however it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits. See Program number 8 digits for details.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

Pointer to the ODBMDIP structure including the execution pointer information.
The ODBMDIP structure is as follows.
Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

Pointer to the ODBMDIP structure including the execution pointer information.
The ODBMDIP structure is as follows.

item.name: EW_FUNC
item.content:
Unavailable (Series 15i,16/18, 16i/18i, Power Mate i)
This application is not customized for the program number 8 digits.
See Program number 8 digits for details.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
No option
The extended driver/library function is necessary.

item.name: EW_MODE
item.content:
CNC mode error
Set CNC mode to MDI.

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D, Series 30i and PMi-A, the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

mode.cmn: This function must be used in MDI mode.
